page.title: 07Housing
page.content: There is a wide range of housing in our area. In the villages much of the housing is of the local ironstone and some of the houses in Great Dodington still have thatched roofs. The housing on the Kingsway Estate was built by the Local Authority. Some of these houses have been sold to their tenants who have made improvements to them adding rooms, replacing windows and fences and building garages. Some of the houses now becoming shabby and show signs of neglect by their occupants and the Local Authority. There is evidence of vandalism in some of the shared areas especially in the shopping area which is in the centre of the estate. The prices of housing range from about 25 000 for a small semi to 85 000 for a detached house in Great Doddington.
